cab.content: )03Wm IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS ERITAK1TIC MAJESTY'S SOYJKKMMT, )K R E T.CABINET. GOVERTMBKT BUSINESS. ITote by, the Secretary.With a view to the early consideration of the question of the Government1s legislative programme, the Prime Minister will be glad if his colleagues will arrange for the Cabinet Secretariat to be notified as soon as possible of what legislative measures their respective Departments consider that it is absolutely necessary should be introduced in the next Parliamentary Session.Replies to this enquiry should reach Mr. R,B. Howorth, 2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. not later than 12, noon, on Thursday, January 18th, 1923.(Signed) M, P. A, HANKEY........... Secretary, Cabinet.[Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. 13th January, 1923.
